title: Data Engineering Suite
description: Comprehensive toolkit for data engineers working with databases, ETL pipelines, and data infrastructure. Includes database design, optimization, and cloud services integration.
author: JSONbored
useCases: Migrating data systems to the cloud

items.reason: Expert guidance for database design, optimization, and troubleshooting
Integrates AWS data services like RDS, DynamoDB, and S3
Connects to Airtable for flexible data management and workflows
Provides database best practices and optimization rules
Optimizes SQL queries and database schemas
Helps debug data pipeline issues and query performance problems

troubleshooting.issue: AWS MCP server auth conflicts with Airtable MCP credentials
troubleshooting.solution: Configure separate credential stores for each MCP server. Use AWS_PROFILE env var for aws-services-mcp-server, AIRTABLE_API_KEY for airtable-mcp-server. Keep credentials in different config files.

troubleshooting.issue: Database agent and rules provide contradicting optimization advice
troubleshooting.solution: Install database-expert rules before database-specialist-agent. Agent will defer to rules for best practices. Update rules file to match your database engine (PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc.).

troubleshooting.issue: MCP servers fail to initialize due to missing AWS SDK dependencies
troubleshooting.solution: Install AWS SDK before MCP servers: npm install @aws-sdk/client-rds @aws-sdk/client-dynamodb @aws-sdk/client-s3. Then reinstall aws-services-mcp-server to detect installed SDKs.

troubleshooting.issue: Optimize command incompatible with database agent's schema format
troubleshooting.solution: Ensure database-specialist-agent and optimize command use same schema definition format. Install agent first to establish format, then install optimize command to inherit conventions.

troubleshooting.issue: Collection setup fails without proper AWS region configuration
troubleshooting.solution: Set AWS_REGION environment variable before installing MCP servers: export AWS_REGION=us-east-1. Configure region in Claude Code settings under MCP server preferences. Restart Claude after setting.
